Name: Super Lumi Live
About the game: Control the cute and speedy Lumi to reach the producer, Lord Leo, and escape his diabolical game show! Easy to play, difficult to master Simple controls with movement that's fast, fluid and precise yet deep. 60 unique levels spread across 6 themed worlds Explore levels for tokens to unlock new paths on the map screen allowing for different ways to reach the end and beat Lord Leo. Awesomely bouncy electronic beats Tonnes of melodic electronic music tracks driving the action with beat-matched visuals. Replays and Ghosts Nuances to the movement in a game designed to not limit your mastery brings with it ways to always improve your times! See how you rank on the leaderboards or share your best replays with the world! Level/world editors Create and share your own devilish levels and worlds via the Steam Workshop with fully integrated editors. ALL future updates and content are free With at least one new shorter campaign planned and new feature updates, you pay once and get everything Super Lumi Live for life.
